title: Weekly Inspiration - August 2025
content: This week's message focuses on love and unity in our families and communities. True Mother's recent guidance reminds us that we are called to be peacemakers in our daily lives.
author: FFWPU Philippines Admin

title: Monthly Newsletter - July 2025
content: Celebrating our community achievements and upcoming events. Special focus on True Parents' legacy and our mission in the Philippines.
author: FFWPU Philippines Admin
